steps.title: Site Assessment & Preparation

steps.description: Excavate 100mm deep footprint. Compact ground with layer of gravel. Mix and pour concrete slab (1:3:6 cement:sand:stone).

substeps: Connect 25mm outlet pipe from tank to tap point(s)

steps.title: Testing & Commissioning

substeps: Confirm correct polarity and system wiring
Run test pump cycle at midday for optimal sun
